metadata.title: CVE-2021-20224 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow issue was discovered in ImageMagick'sExportIndexQuantum() function in MagickCore/quantum-export.c. Functioncalls to GetPixelIndex() could result in values outside the range ofrepresentable for the 'unsigned char'. When ImageMagick processes a craftedpdf file, this could lead to an undefined behaviour or a crash.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
